comment.author: 98504473@N05
comment._content: Wow, this is magic, as if de ja vu. As a baby boomer I got to be a sea changer the right time and the right place as per my personal classification, only after a short decade everything and I meant everything will be taken away from us, that quick. And this fireplace was pure reason why we wanted a house close by the sea, as a matter of fact, it was in a place, though Ab Origine in name but the English translation was ''THE PLACE TO SETTLE''. Thanks for caring to share. Magnifique!!!
